title: Void a Claim
description: A biller discovers a claim was submitted for a service that was cancelled and never occurred. The claim needs to be voided.

tasks.description: Locate the submitted claim that needs to be voided.
Verify with the clinical department that the service was indeed cancelled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller confirms the service should not have been billed.

tasks.description: Submit a void/replacement claim to the payer to retract the original submission.
tasks.expected_outcome: The original claim is cancelled at the payer, preventing an incorrect payment.
